name: Scrapmetal Pilot
description:
This is a little project I made for school. I created this completely on my own and every model asset and code is done by myself.

The game is a simple maze solving game, where you take the controll of a drone and navigate it through 3 unique levels with it's own features. Including a fourth tutorial level. 
But be aware that you have just a limited distance from the next active radio tower. Find their buttons to activate them and also find a way to open the doors in your way.

The mazes become more complicated as also different levels of height are included in the later levels.
